text: Sebastián Reyes (born 12 March 1997) is a Bolivian professional footballer who plays as a defender for C.D. Jorge Wilstermann in the Bolivian Primera División.https://int.soccerway.com/players/juan-sebastian--reyes/295157/ On 20 November 2018 Reyes made his debut for the Bolivia national football team against Iraq.https://int.soccerway.com/matches/2018/11/20/world/friendlies/iraq/bolivia/2935247/ ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Bolivian footballers Category:Bolivia international footballers Category:Bolivia youth international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Club Petrolero players Category:C.D. Jorge Wilstermann players Category:Bolivian Primera División players Category:People from Cochabamba
title: Sebastián Reyes
